display_long_description:
Horror movies, horror stories and paranormal activities have long fascinated people. "VR Horror Stories" is a passive horror experience that places viewers in dark, haunted environments where terrifying monsters, zombies, ghosts, or demons lurks around you. It features 23 short 360°/180° horror videos, totaling 64 minutes, each enhanced with spatial audio to help you locate surrounding threats before they close in on you. Experience a mix of atmospheric scares and narrative-driven stories, with multilingual subtitles through a user-friendly interface. 

Why "VR Horror Stories"?

1. Love for Horror Movies: People have a fascination with horror movies. We bring that excitement to a whole new level with VR.

2. Passion for Great Sound:  Spatialized audio enhances the horror experience, making every sound feel like it’s coming from the real world.

3. Curated High-Quality Content: View curated, high-quality 360 videos in one place.

4. Simplified Process: Our app is designed to be intuitive, allowing users to dive into the horror experience without any hassle.

5. Need for Passive Experiences: Experience horror without the need for active participation.

6. Multilingual subtitles are available via the "CC" button, located on the left side of the on-screen transport window : Chinese, French, German, Hindi, Japanese, and Spanish.

Download our app now and start watching today!

*To enjoy our high-quality VR horror movies, ensure sufficient storage space on your device. 11 GB recommended

publisher_name: Immersive Sound VR / Studio Digilog Inc
